instruction: Explain what is meant by the phrase "digital divide".
output: The digital divide is the gap between those people who have access to modern technology and those who do not. Those with access to modern technology, such as the internet, have more opportunities for communication, education, and resources than those who don't.

instruction:
Identify the main theme of the following poem:

"I'd climb a hill so high,
That I could touch the stars in the sky,
And I'd watch the birds fly by"
output: The main theme of the poem is ambition and determination. The speaker is expressing a desire to reach for their dreams.

instruction: Formulate a hypothesis for why some animals migrate.
output: My hypothesis is that some animals migrate in order to find better sources of food and to avoid predators in different climates.

instruction: Generate a movie review for the film "Iron Man".
output: Iron Man is a great action-adventure movie that can also be enjoyed by both adults and children alike. Robert Downey Jr. really shines in the role of Tony Stark, the billionaire industrialist and genius inventor. His performance is full of humour and charisma. The action sequences are intense and the special effects are top-notch. The storyline of Iron Man is gripping and its characters are both likable and compelling. Overall, Iron Man is an entertaining movie that is sure to please audiences of all ages.

instruction: Rewrite this sentence using appropriate grammar rules:
output: It hurt its finger.

instruction: Identify the main points from the following paragraph:
input: At the beginning of my experiment, I was uncertain whether it would be successful. I knew the general theory upon which the experiment was based and had designed it very carefully. After performing the experiment, my results confirmed that the theory was correct and that it could be used to help make decisions.
output:
Main points:
1. Experiment was based on a general theory.
2. Experiment was designed carefully
3. Results confirmed the theory was correct
4. Theory can be used to make decisions.

instruction: Tell a story about a robot stranded on an island.
output: Once upon a time there was a robot named JEDI who found itself stranded on a remote island. Its programming was too basic to help it escape, and all it could do was explore the island and the sea around it. During its explorations, JEDI found the remains of a shipwreck and worked tirelessly to repair it, so that he could sail off the island. After a long and arduous journey, JEDI was able to cross the sea and make its way back home to its creator.

output: Excited for the upcoming #HBSymposium! Join us for great conversations about the future of #Innovation and #Technology. #HBinfluencers

instruction: Multiply 4 and 7.
Find the antonym for the word 'abstemious'.
output: Indulgent.

instruction: Describe the character "Moth" from the book 'Les Misérables'.
output: Moth is a character from the book Les Misérables who is full of life and loves storytelling. He is incredibly loyal to his friends and is always willing to do whatever it takes to save them. He is also a bright force of optimism and joy, despite the ever-present darkness of his situation.

instruction: Provide a short summary of the article content in fewer than 100 words.
input: Whales are a widely distributed and diverse group of fully aquatic placental marine mammals. They are an informal grouping within the infraorder Cetacea, which usually excludes dolphins and porpoises. Whales, dolphins and porpoises belong to the order Cetartiodactyla, which consists of even-toed ungulates. Their closest non-cetacean living relatives are the hippopotamuses, from which they and other cetaceans diverged about 54 million years ago.
output: Whales are a fascinating species of aquatic mammals that have been around for millions of years. They belong to the infraorder Cetacea and the order Cetartiodactyla, and their closest non-cetacean relatives are the hippopotamuses. Whales have been divided into 8 families, each of which have their own unique features and adaptations. This article provides a comprehensive overview of whales and their evolution over time.

instruction: Troubleshoot the following error message: "An unknown error occurred. Error code: 500."
output: The error code 500 is an internal server error, indicating that something has gone wrong on the server side of the application. It could be due to a number of reasons, such as a misconfiguration, server overload due to high traffic, issues with the application’s coding and logic, or a problem with the server’s hardware or operating system. In order to troubleshoot the issue, it is important to look at the application and server logs to identify what has caused the error. After identifying the cause, the problem can be fixed and the error should be resolved.

instruction: Generate a list of steps to set up a Google account.
output:
Steps to Set Up a Google Account:
1. Go to www.google.com in your web browser and click on the “Sign In” link at the top right corner of the page.
2. Click the “Create Account” button on the next page. 
3. Enter your desired username and click “Next”.
4. Enter your desired password and click “Next”.
5. Enter your personal information such as name, gender, birthdate, phone number, and email address and click “Next”.
6. Enter your location and time zone and click “Next”. 
7. Pick a profile photo or upload one and click “Next”.
8. Review the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy and click “Agree”.
9. Click “Continue to Gmail” and you are done!

instruction: Infer the meaning of the following example using standard rules:
output: The meaning of the example is that the cat was running in circles, trying to catch its own tail. This can either signify playfulness or frustration.

instruction: List the advantages of eating a plant-based diet for athletes.
output:
Advantages of Eating a Plant-Based Diet for Athletes:
1. Lower risk of contracting chronic illnesses: Plant-based diets are typically low in saturated fat and cholesterol, therefore reducing the risk of chronic diseases like heart disease and diabetes. 
2. Improved digestion: Eating a plant-based diet can reduce digestion issues such as gas and bloating. This can lead to improved gut health and a faster breakdown in food. 
3. Higher intake of antioxidants: A plant-based diet is rich in antioxidants, which can help to reduce the oxidative stress caused by intense physical activity. 
4. A more sustainable lifestyle: Eating a plant-based diet is more sustainable than eating an animal-based diet since it produces fewer greenhouse emissions and depletion of natural resources. 
5. Increased energy levels: Plant-based diets are low in saturated fats and cholesterol, allowing for a more efficient metabolism and increased energy levels. 
6. Lower costs: Plant-based diets are significantly cheaper than animal-based diets. 
7. Improved athletic performance: Eating a plant-based diet can help to increase power, strength, and aerobic endurance by reducing inflammation and improving muscle recovery from exercise.

instruction: Structure a response to introduce yourself at a networking event.
output: Hello! My name is [Name]. I'm currently a [Position], and I recently graduated with a degree in [Degree]. My biggest passion is [Passion] and I'm excited to be here to expand my network. I'm looking forward to learning more about the industry, as well as meeting new people.

instruction: Summarize the following blog post in 5 sentences:
input: The blog post, titled "10 Technology Trends That Will Impact Business in 2020", provides an overview of the ten most popular and noteworthy tech trends in business today. Companies are utilizing new technological advancements in order to stay competitive and maximize customer experience. Furthermore, such advancements will help businesses to manage costs, increase efficiency, and gain a competitive edge.
output: The blog post discusses the top 10 technology trends that are currently impacting business. These trends include Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing, Internet of Things, Virtual & Augmented Reality, Blockchain, and Robotics. Companies are using these technologies to reduce costs, increase efficiency, and improve customer experience. Additionally, businesses are leveraging their data to gain new insights and develop strategies to gain a competitive edge. These technologies will continue to be the driving forces of business in 2020 and beyond.
